attributes.action: Make the csa fairer looking at indivdual cases, and ask for realistic amounts of money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people are losing their homes, familys and jobs due to massivly imposed demands from the csa, they have to much power and make unrealistic assumption about personal circumstance, taking 40% of somebodys wages is madness and the situation must be addressed before more of our children end up in broken homes!
